Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Take and deal 1 extra damage per [#8b0000]Vicious stack. Certain cards gain new effects based on [#8b0000]Vicious.
Use [#ffc200]Ego to debuff your enemies or force their actions.

Deal double damage to enemies with Block.
Enemies lose HP equal to half the destroyed Block.
Increase the [#3333aa]Ink counter to create delayed attacks or reactive defense.
Gain [#ffc200]Ego whenever you attack enemies or take damage. Certain cards gain extra effects based on [#ffc200]Ego.
Fenrir evolves over the course of the fight and gets stronger whenever certain conditions are met.
